panels.description: The graph shows whether client and backend kameleeon visitor codes match each other
panels.title: Kameleeon Visitor Code Status

targets.expr: sum by (name) (irate(spring_integration_send_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name!~"$excluded_stream_channels", result="success"}[1m])) /  sum by (name) (irate(spring_integration_send_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name!~"$excluded_stream_channels", result="success"}[1m]))
sum by (name) (increase(spring_integration_send_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name!="unknown", result!="success"}[5m]))

seriesOverrides.alias: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.legendFormat: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (method) (irate(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", repository="$spring_data_repository_name"}[1m])) / sum by (method) (irate(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", repository="$spring_data_repository_name"}[1m]))

seriesOverrides.alias: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (repository, method) (increase(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", exception!="none"}[5m]))

sum(increase(cache_gets_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", result="hit"}[5m])) by (cache) / sum(increase(cache_gets_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (cache)

sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", outcome="SUCCESS", uri=~"/actuator/(info|health)"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", outcome="SUCCESS", uri=~"/actuator/(info|health)"}[5m]))
sum by (method, uri, status, pod) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome!="SUCCESS", uri=~"/actuator/(info|health)"}[5m]))

panels.title: Actuator Response Statuses 4xx/5xx by (method, path, status, pod) [5m]
